creator: torstenknodt@datas-world.de
text:
Hello,
for my ImageMapTranscoder I need the BridgeContext and GVTBuilder from
SVGAbstractTranscoder also for me. I moved them out of the transcoder method
into the class as protected.
BTW: What is the right Component for Transcoders?

creator: deweese@apache.org
text: Patch (or something very much like it) will be committed soon.
